lines.text: Converting vectors from polar to components

secText:
Lesson:
1. Convert from [OBJ:expsec_d495:rectangular components to polar form].
2. Convert from [OBJ:expsec_d4955:polar form to rectangular components].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37433:Calculate] polar form given rectangular form.
2. [OBJ:qc_37432:Calculate] rectangular form given polar form.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_rectangular_polar:Converting Components to Polar], [OBJ:sum_polar_rec:Converting Polar to Components]
